item.title: Making the Blog Accessible on the Web
item.description: Initially, we registered for access to the AWS website. We started a virtual machine using EC2 (Image 1), from AWS, running the Amazon Linux 2 distribution (Images 2 and 3). We performed the updates of the VM’s operating system (with the command: sudo yum update) (Image 4) and installed the Apache service to create the blog Host on the Web (Image 5), for this it was necessary to compile the blog.
